messages.subject: Re: NC article about unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: My boys and I were the ones in the article and they sure did get a kick out of seeing themselves in the paper!  They got recognized while we were out and
messages.messageBody:
My boys and I were the ones in the article and they sure did get a
kick out of seeing themselves in the paper! They got "recognized"
while we were out and about yesterday and that was a real hoot.

I was nervous about doing it but I think the young woman who wrote it
did a fantastic job.

Thanks Kelly, for posting the link here!

Sincerely,

Evie Curley
>

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] NC article about unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Cool! Quite well done, I think. thanks for sharing. Melissa Mom to Josh (12), Breanna (10), Emily (8), Rachel (7), Sam (6), Dan (4), and Avari Rose (19 months)
messages.messageBody:
Cool! Quite well done, I think. thanks for sharing.
Melissa
Mom to Josh (12), Breanna (10), Emily (8), Rachel (7), Sam (6), Dan
(4), and Avari Rose (19 months)
